duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform phlebotomy and technical and clerical functions in the Laboratory.
Handle blood, tissue, fecal matter, sputum, urine, spinal fluid and other body fluids.
Follow established lab guidelines and principles of human growth and development.
Utilize customer focus, teamwork, adaptability to change, problem solving, and communication.
Handle specimens contaminated with infectious diseases including HIV and other blood borne pathogens.

education_certification.credential: 6 months - 1 year experience in phlebotomy and/or specimen processing
Active driver’s license and carry personal auto insurance for those working in a skilled nursing facility setting
